welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hove, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our unique shops, cafes, and stunning seafront, and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shoreham Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves a wide range of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, serving a large number of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'Gatwick Free Wi-Fi' network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a small selection of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on private jets, the private jet terminal at Goodwood Airport offers a luxurious and exclusive experience with personalized services and amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
